transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(10,2),
		Total_Revenue as decimal(10,2),
		Total_Sales_Costs as decimal(10,2),
		Total_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Units_Sold as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Costs as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Process_Name as string,
		CurrentReportingPeriod as date,
		RowNumber as long,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg as string,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty derive(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Sales_Type),'/Sales Type',''),
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Total_Revenue),'/Total_Revenue','')) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Total_Revenue,
		Total_Sales_Costs,
		Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Total_Revenue,
		Total_Sales_Costs,
		Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(and (RowNumber > 1, not(isNull(Sales_Type)) || not(isNull(Sales_UOM))||not(isNull(Sales_Point))||not(isNull(Total_Units_Sold))||not(isNull(Total_Revenue))||not(isNull(Total_Sales_Costs))
||not(isNull(Budget_Units_Sold))||not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue))||not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Costs)))) ~> ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold),
		Total_Revenue = toDecimal(Total_Revenue),
		Total_Sales_Costs = toDecimal(Total_Sales_Costs),
		each(match(regexMatch(name,'Budget')), $$ = toDecimal($$)),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Total_Revenue,
		Total_Sales_Costs,
		Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Error_ID as long,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type = Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue = Total_Revenue,
		Sales_Cost = Total_Sales_Costs,
		Sales_Net_Revenue = Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost = Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Type,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList
